sqlMap.select: SELECT /* TXMC0140.SEARCH00.대손세액공제(변제)신고서(인적사항)조회 */ BRANCH_CD /* 지점코드 */ , BRANCH_NM /* 지점명 */ , BIZ_NO /* 사업자 번호 */ , CORP_NM /* 상호(법인명)*/ , CORP_MASTER /* 대표자 */ , CORP_ADDR /* 사업자 소재지 */ , CORP_TYPENM /* 업태 */ , CORP_LINE /* 업종 */ FROM VA_VATBRANCH /* [부가세용 사업장 정보 VIEW] */ WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN#

SELECT /* TXMC0140.SEARCH01.대손세액공제(변제)신고서(세부내용)조회 */ A.BRANCH_CD , A.VAT_YYYY , A.VAT_QUARTER , A.VAT_SERIAL /*일련번호*/ , A.BDR_TYPECD /*대손변제구분*/ , A.BDR_YMD /*대손변제일*/ , A.BDR_SAMT /*대손변제금액*/ , A.BDR_VAMT /*대손변제세액*/ , B.CUST_DIV /*거래처구분*/ , A.CUST_CD /*거래처코드*/ , B.CUST_NM /*거래처상호*/ , B.CUST_MASTER /*거래처대표자*/ , DECODE(B.CUST_DIV, 1, B.CUST_BIZNO, 2, B.CUST_SSN) AS CUST_NO /*거래처 사업자/주민번호*/ , A.BDR_REMARK /*대손변제사유*/ FROM TA_VAT112_D A LEFT OUTER JOIN VA_VATCUST B ON A.CUST_CD = B.CUST_CD WHERE A.BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND A.VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND A.VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# ORDER BY A.BDR_TYPECD, A.VAT_SERIAL

SELECT /* TXMC0140.SEARCH02.대손세액공제(변제)신고서(세부내용)조회 */ BRANCH_CD , VAT_YYYY , VAT_QUARTER , VAT_SERIAL /*일련번호*/ , BDR_TYPECD /*대손변제구분*/ , BDR_YMD /*대손변제일*/ , BDR_SAMT /*대손변제금액*/ , BDR_VAMT /*대손변제세액*/ , CUST_DIV /*거래처구분*/ , CUST_CD /*거래처코드*/ , CUST_NM /*거래처상호*/ , CUST_MASTER /*거래처대표자*/ , CUST_NO /*거래처 사업자/주민번호*/ , BDR_REMARK /*대손변제사유*/ FROM (SELECT A.BRANCH_CD , A.VAT_YYYY , A.VAT_QUARTER , A.VAT_SERIAL , A.BDR_TYPECD , A.BDR_YMD , A.BDR_SAMT , A.BDR_VAMT , B.CUST_DIV , A.CUST_CD , B.CUST_NM , B.CUST_MASTER , DECODE(B.CUST_DIV, 1, B.CUST_BIZNO, 2, B.CUST_SSN) AS CUST_NO , A.BDR_REMARK , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BRANCH_CD,VAT_YYYY,VAT_QUARTER,VAT_SERIAL) AS ROW_NUM FROM TA_VAT112_D A LEFT OUTER JOIN VA_VATCUST B ON A.CUST_CD = B.CUST_CD WHERE A.BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND A.VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND A.VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# ) WHERE 1=1
BDR_TYPECD = #BDR_TYPECD#
ROW_NUM IN (1,2,3)
ROW_NUM > 3
ORDER BY BDR_TYPECD, VAT_SERIAL

SELECT /* TXMC0140.PROC00.대손세액공제(변제)신고서(세부내용) 처리 */ A.BRANCH_CD , A.VAT_YYYY , A.VAT_QUARTER , ROWNUM AS VAT_SERIAL /*일련번호*/ , C.APPL_V112 AS BDR_TYPECD /*대손변제구분*/ , A.VAT_YMD AS BDR_YMD /*대손변제일*/ , A.VAT_SAMT AS BDR_SAMT /*대손변제금액*/ , A.VAT_VAMT AS BDR_VAMT /*대손변제세액*/ , A.CUST_CD /*거래처코드*/ , D.CUST_NM /*거래처상호*/ , D.CUST_MASTER /*거래처대표자*/ , D.CUST_DIV /*거래처구분*/ , DECODE(D.CUST_DIV, 1, D.CUST_BIZNO, 2, D.CUST_SSN) AS CUST_NO /*거래처 사업자/주민번호*/ , '' AS BDR_REMARK /*대손변제사유*/ FROM TA_VATRAW A LEFT OUTER JOIN TA_VATCDH B ON A.VATH_TYPECD = B.VATH_TYPECD LEFT OUTER JOIN TA_VATCDD C ON A.VATH_TYPECD = C.VATH_TYPECD AND A.VATD_TYPECD = C.VATD_TYPECD LEFT OUTER JOIN VA_VATCUST D ON A.CUST_CD = D.CUST_CD WHERE A.BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND A.VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND A.VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND Nvl(C.APPL_V112, '0') <> '0' ORDER BY BDR_TYPECD, VAT_SERIAL
sqlMap.insert:
DECLARE /* TXMC0140.SAVE00.대손세액공제(변제)신고서(세부내용) 저장 */ v_ROWCNT INT; BEGIN SELECT COUNT(0) INTO v_ROWCNT FROM TA_VAT101_H1 WHERE BRANCH_CD = #BRANCH_CD# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#;
IF v_ROWCNT = 0 THEN INSERT INTO TA_VAT101_H1 ( BRANCH_CD , VAT_YYYY , VAT_QUARTER ) VALUES ( #BRANCH_CD# , #VAT_YYYY# , #VAT_QUARTER# ); END IF; INSERT INTO TA_VAT112_D ( /* [대손세액공제(변제)신고서_세부] */ BRANCH_CD /* VAT_지점코드 */ ,VAT_YYYY /* VAT_VAT년도 */ ,VAT_QUARTER /* VAT_VAT분기 */ ,VAT_SERIAL /* VAT_일련번호 */ ,BDR_TYPECD /* VAT_대손변제구분 */ ,BDR_YMD /* VAT_대손변제일 */ ,BDR_SAMT /* VAT_대손변제금액 */ ,BDR_VAMT /* VAT_대손변제세액 */ ,CUST_CD /* VAT_거래처코드 */ ,BDR_REMARK /* VAT_대손변제사유 */ ,INST_USID /* 입력작업자 */ ,INST_DATE /* 입력일시 */ ,UPDT_USID /* 수정작업자 */ ,UPDT_DATE /* 수정일시 */ ) VALUES ( #BRANCH_CD# /* VAT_지점코드 */ ,#VAT_YYYY# /* VAT_VAT년도 */ ,#VAT_QUARTER# /* VAT_VAT분기 */ ,(SELECT NVL(MAX(VAT_SERIAL) + 1, 1) FROM TA_VAT112_D WHERE BRANCH_CD = #BRANCH_CD# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_SERIAL = #VAT_SERIAL# ) /* VAT_일련번호 */ ,#BDR_TYPECD# /* VAT_대손변제구분 */ ,#BDR_YMD# /* VAT_대손변제일 */ ,#BDR_SAMT# /* VAT_대손변제금액 */ ,#BDR_VAMT# /* VAT_대손변제세액 */ ,#CUST_CD# /* VAT_거래처코드 */ ,#BDR_REMARK# /* VAT_대손변제사유 */ ,#UPDT_USID# /* 입력작업자 */ ,SYSDATE /* 입력일시 */ ,#UPDT_USID# /* 수정작업자 */ ,SYSDATE /* 수정일시 */ ); END;
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TA_VAT112_D /* TXMC0140.DELETE00.대손세액공제(변제)신고서(세부내용) 삭제 */ /* [대손세액공제(변제)신고서_세부] */ WHERE BRANCH_CD = #BRANCH_CD# /* VAT_지점코드 */ AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# /* VAT_VAT년도 */ AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# /* VAT_VAT분기 */ AND VAT_SERIAL = #VAT_SERIAL# /* VAT_일련번호 */
